projects.title: Artemis Insurance
projects.bodyText:
- Contributing in agile environment as a developer to design and develop Features using Angular for “Nationwide Insurance” application used by ISP’S.
 -  Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Angular to create user-friendly experiences. 
 - Interacting with on-site Client’s business people as and when applicable before and after feature development completion.
 - Worked on reusable Libraries to consume these components in different projects. 
 - Worked on creating new libraries using Angular 12 and client UI Library. 
 - Worked on API integration.

projects.title: ITC PET Insurance
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular 14 to create user-friendly experiences. 
 - Implement features and user interfaces based on project requirements.
 - Implement forms with two-way data binding for user input and interaction. Validate user input and manage form submissions effectively. 
 - Worked on array methods to filter and manipulate the arrays for health care products.

projects.title: Standard Charted Bank (Hong Kong)
projects.bodyText:
- Created re-usable components, services and directives. 
 - Requirement understanding, discussion with Managers. 
 - Implemented the UI using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Angular Material. 
 - Render data on UI, which comes into JSON format. 
 - Form validations and showing messages on UI. 
 - Created the Custom Pipesand developed the EMI Calculation Functionality for Business Installment and Guarantor Installment loans. 
 - Worked on save and get Api functionality.
